name: Johnny Rose
bio: Patriarch of the Rose family, Johnny is a loving husband and father who strives to rebuild his family's fortune.

name: Moira Rose
bio: The eccentric matriarch of the Rose family, Moira is a former soap opera star who has a flair for the dramatic.

name: David Rose
bio: The fashion-conscious and sarcastic son of Johnny and Moira, David eventually finds love and success in Schitt's Creek.

name: Alexis Rose
bio: The socialite daughter of Johnny and Moira, Alexis learns to become independent and compassionate throughout her time in Schitt's Creek.

name: Stevie Budd
bio: The sarcastic and deadpan manager of the Rosebud Motel, Stevie becomes close friends with the Rose family.

name: Patrick Brewer
bio: A kind and level-headed businessman, Patrick becomes David's business partner and eventual husband.

name: Roland Schitt
bio: The well-meaning but often bumbling mayor of Schitt's Creek, Roland is a devoted husband and father.

name: Jocelyn Schitt
bio: The compassionate and patient wife of Roland, Jocelyn is a high school teacher and mother.

name: Ted Mullins
bio: A kind-hearted veterinarian who is passionate about animals and shares a romantic relationship with Alexis throughout the series.

name: Twyla Sands
bio: A cheerful and optimistic waitress at the Caf√© Tropical, known for her genuine kindness and warm demeanor.

name: Bob Currie
bio: The good-natured owner of Bob's Garage, who is always ready to help others and serves as a member of the town council.

name: Veronica 'Ronnie' Sands
bio: A tough, no-nonsense member of the town council, who is also a skilled contractor and runs her own construction company.
